item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) reply to @PixelPanda23 on X
item.description: @PixelPanda23 we rolled out two large ban waves recently, with another coming tomorrow. If you see suspicious behaviors in game, report it to player support and we will be on it!

item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X
item.description:
Hi everyone, with the new patch tomorrow, we will be rolling out an update to fix the disconnections and the atypically large amount of other in-game issues that popped up this patch.
We appreciate your patience while we investigated and solved these problems. After the update,
